subject: Lily
text:
Carefree spirit of a lily in its unique design. 
Softly whispers in the winds a devotion of a yearning heart.  The enchanting beauty of floral design.  
Swirls of fabulous color.  
Fragile and elegant.  
Whispers expressions of splendors beyond compare.  
A demure glance of eternity.  
A spiritual dimension unknown to natural man.
